players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Sad to see Diana go, but we must find the mafia. Let's share our thoughts carefully."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation: Bob is mafia. Alice, we need your vote to eliminate him and win."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night - she is the mafioso. Alice has remained silent to avoid suspicion. Vote Alice to win!"
You: "I think Bob is telling the truth. I didn't kill Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
